text: The Son Also Rises may refer to: * "The Son Also Rises" (Battlestar Galactica), an episode of the 2003 television series Battlestar Galactica * The Son Also Rises (book), a 2014 non-fiction book about social mobility by Gregory Clark * "The Son Also Rises", episode of the TV series Invasion * "The Son Also Rises", episode of the TV series L.A. Law * "The Son Also Rises", episode of the TV series Tripping the Rift == See also == * The Sun Also Rises (disambiguation)
title: The Son Also Rises
